DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess immunogenicity safety Boostrix™ compare placebo give 27-36 week gestation healthy woman age 18-45 year . Infants born mother enrol study followed-up two separate clinical study : 201330 [ DTPA ( BOOSTRIX ) -048 PRI ] 201334 [ DTPA ( BOOSTRIX ) -049 BST : 048 ] .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) Biologicals ' Boostrix™ Vaccine Pregnant Women
